setup.name: RMG Setup...
setup.rmc: Additional settings for objects generated by a random map

random.rmc:
{Randomize All Objects}

For all objects that are presented in the RMG Settings dialog at the moment, completely random parameters will be set each time the map is generated. This option is controlled by clicking on this button.

pages.name: General map objects
pages.hint:
Edit generation of common map objects
Hotkey: "{2}"
pages.rmc:
{General map objects}

Read {"Help"} for more information about adding and editing common map objects.
pages.help:
{Help on common map objects}:
Many of these objects have strong restrictions on the number in the zone and on the map, since each of them has an id, which is added to the bit set for each hero, so setting the value above 32 does not make sense (P.S.: I haven't tried it and I don't advise you ).

pages.name: Creature dwellings
pages.hint:
Edit the generation of creature dwellings on the map.
Hotkey: "{3}"
pages.rmc:
{Creature dwellings}

Read {"Help"} for more information on adding and editing creature dwellings.

pages.name:
WoG objects (type 63)
(Check WoG options)
pages.rmc:
{WoG objects}

Read {"Help"} for more information on adding and editing WoG objects.
pages.help:
{Help on WoG objects}:
WoG objects (type 63) are also added via json, but all their mechanics are scripted (for now). Before including an object in generation, make sure that the corresponding object has a script or other implementation. Otherwise, an empty object will appear on the map, which will "eat" part of the value of the zone.

cancel.rmc:
{Cancel}

Close the dialog without making changes

random.rmc:
{Random}

Set random settings for all objects on the current page. Please note that high object values will simply prevent them from being generated in some zones.
random.hint:
Randomize the value of objects
Hotkey: "{R}"

default.rmc:
{Default}

Set default settings for all objects on the current page. The values are taken from the base game and json files.
